The WWE World Championshipis widely recognized as the most historic championship in WWE.

Dating back to 1963, the WWE World Championshipwas first awarded to Buddy Rogers after he defeated Antonino Rocca in the finals of a tournament in April. Since that time, the biggest names in the business have held the title, including Bruno Sammartino, Andre the Giant, Bret Hart, The Rock and "Stone Cold" Steve Austin.
